00042 std::string TShapeOrientB2::get_name() const
00043   { return "TShapeOrientB2"; }
00044 
00045 TShapeOrientB2::~TShapeOrientB2() {}
00046 
00047 bool TShapeOrientB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00048                                double& result, 
00049                                MsqError& err )
00050 {
00051   double tau = det(T);
00052   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00053     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00054     return false;
00055   }
00056   const double tr = trace(T);
00057   result = (0.5/tau) * (sqr_Frobenius( T ) - 0.5 * tr * fabs(tr));
00058   return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool TShapeOrientB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00062                                          double& result, 
00063                                          MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00064                                          MsqError& err )
00065 {
00066   double tau = det(T);
00067   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00068     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00069     return false;
00070   }
00071   const double b = 0.5/tau;
00072 
00073   const double tr = trace(T);
00074   const double f = 0.5 * fabs(tr);
00075   result = sqr_Frobenius( T ) - f * tr;
00076   
00077   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00078   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -f );
00079   deriv_wrt_T *= 2*tau;
00080   deriv_wrt_T -= result * transpose_adj(T);
00081   
00082   result *= b;
00083   deriv_wrt_T *= b/tau;
00084   
00085   return true;
00086 }
00087 
00088 bool TShapeOrientB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00089                                          double& result, 
00090                                          MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00091                                          MsqMatrix<2,2> second_wrt_T[3],
00092                                          MsqError& err )
00093 {
00094   double tau = det(T);
00095   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00096     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00097     return false;
00098   }
00099   const double b = 0.5/tau;
00100 
00101     // calculate non-barrier value (ShapeOrientAlt1)
00102   const double tr = trace(T);
00103   const double f = 0.5 * fabs(tr);
00104   result = sqr_Frobenius( T ) - f * tr;
00105   
00106     // calculate non-barrier first derivatives
00107   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00108   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -f );
00109   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00110   
00111     // calculate barrier second derivs
00112   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00113   set_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -b/tau, deriv_wrt_T, adjt );
00114   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, result/(tau*tau*tau), adjt );
00115   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -result * b / tau, T );
00116     // calculate non-barrier barrier portion of second derivs
00117   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 1/tau );
00118   pluseq_scaled_outer_product_I_I( second_wrt_T, 0.5/tau * (tr < 0 ? 1 : -1) );
00119   
00120     // calculate barrier derivs from non-barrier
00121   deriv_wrt_T *= tau;
00122   deriv_wrt_T -= result * adjt;
00123   deriv_wrt_T *= b/tau;
00124   
00125     // barrier value from non-barrier
00126   result *= b;
00127   return true;
00128 }
00129 
00130 bool TShapeOrientB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00131                                double& result, 
00132                                MsqError& err )
00133 {
00134   double tau = det(T);
00135   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00136     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00137     return false;
00138   }
00139   const double tr = trace(T);
00140   result = (0.5/tau) * (sqr_Frobenius( T ) - MSQ_ONE_THIRD * tr * fabs(tr));
00141   return true;
00142 }
00143 
00144 bool TShapeOrientB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00145                                          double& result, 
00146                                          MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00147                                          MsqError& err )
00148 {
00149   double tau = det(T);
00150   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00151     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00152     return false;
00153   }
00154   const double b = 0.5/tau;
00155 
00156   const double tr = trace(T);
00157   const double f = MSQ_ONE_THIRD * fabs(tr);
00158   result = sqr_Frobenius( T ) - f * tr;
00159   
00160   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00161   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -f );
00162   deriv_wrt_T *= 2*tau;
00163   deriv_wrt_T -= result * transpose_adj(T);
00164   
00165   result *= b;
00166   deriv_wrt_T *= b/tau;
00167   
00168   return true;
00169 }
00170 
00171 bool TShapeOrientB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00172                                          double& result, 
00173                                          MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00174                                          MsqMatrix<3,3> second_wrt_T[6],
00175                                          MsqError& err )
00176 {
00177   double tau = det(T);
00178   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00179     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00180     result = 0.0;
00181     return false;
00182   }
00183   const double b = 0.5/tau;
00184 
00185     // calculate non-barrier value (ShapeOrientAlt1)
00186   const double tr = trace(T);
00187   const double f = MSQ_ONE_THIRD * fabs(tr);
00188   result = sqr_Frobenius( T ) - f * tr;
00189   
00190     // calculate non-barrier first derivatives
00191   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00192   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -f );
00193   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00194   
00195     // calculate barrier second derivs
00196   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00197   set_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -b/tau, deriv_wrt_T, adjt );
00198   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, result/(tau*tau*tau), adjt );
00199   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -result * b / tau, T );
00200     // calculate non-barrier barrier portion of second derivs
00201   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 1/tau );
00202   pluseq_scaled_outer_product_I_I( second_wrt_T, MSQ_ONE_THIRD/tau * (tr < 0 ? 1 : -1) );
00203   
00204     // calculate barrier derivs from non-barrier
00205   deriv_wrt_T *= tau;
00206   deriv_wrt_T -= result * adjt;
00207   deriv_wrt_T *= b/tau;
00208   
00209     // barrier value from non-barrier
00210   result *= b;
00211   return true;
00212 }
